alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 9:19PM CDT until June 02 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. Minnesota River at Savage affecting Dakota, Carver, Scott and Hennepin Counties. .River levels are slowly falling back, with chances for showers and thunderstorms over the next few days likely causing localized impacts. Unless there is a direct storm over the parts of the rivers already in flood stage, the gradual decrease in levels should continue. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Riverside Rd and Front Street flooded in North Redwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 830 PM CDT Friday, the stage was 22.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 830 PM CDT Friday was 22.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.2 feet on 05/02/2006. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
